title: George Whitefield: The Life and Times of the Great Evangelist of the Eighteenth-Century Revival - Volume I
description: Volume 1 brings the story of Whitefield's life and of the evangelical revival up to the end of the year 1740. Volume 2 follows events onwards until his death in 1770. An outstanding biography, popularly written, and with an urgent message for the present day.
author: Arnold A. Dallimore
